author: Yahoo Finance
title: Iran's supreme leader attends memorial to commander killed in Syria
text:
dpa international Iran's supreme leader attends memorial to commander killed in Syria DPA December 28, 2023 at 2:28 PM · 2 min read 28 Link Copied Read full article Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei stands before the coffin of senior Iranian commander Seyed Razi Mousavi, who Tehran says was killed in an Israeli airstrike in Syria. -/Iranian Supreme Leader's Office/dpa Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again later. More content below Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again later. More content below
Thousands of government supporters on Thursday flocked to the memorial service for senior Iranian commander Seyed Razi Mousavi, who Tehran says was killed in an Israeli airstrike in Syria.
Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei was among the many high-ranking politicians and officers attending the burial service at a Shiite shrine in Tehran, according to Iranian state media.
Mousavi, from Iran's Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps (IRGC), was killed on Monday in a suspected Israeli airstrike on a suburb of the Syrian capital Damascus.
The leadership in Tehran has vowed to avenge his death.
IRGC commander-in-chief Hossein Salami repeated old threats against Israel during a speech at the service.
"Our revenge is always bitter. But a revenge equivalent to the martyrdom of Seyed Razi is nothing less than erasing this Zionist regime from the pages of history," the IRNA news agency quoted the Salami as saying.
Iran's leadership has repeatedly threatened to destroy Israel, its declared arch-enemy since the Islamic Revolution of 1979.
According to the New York Times, Mousavi is said to have helped monitor weapons deliveries to Lebanon's Hezbollah militia, which is backed by Iran and has repeatedly launched attacks on northern Israel in support of Hamas since the beginning of the Gaza war.
Israel frequently attacks locations in war-torn Syria to prevent Iran from further expanding its military influence in the region via local militias.
Mousavi was a confidant of the powerful IRGC General Qasem Soleimani, who was killed by the US in a drone attack in Iraq in 2020.
Mousavi had decades of military experience in Syria and Lebanon. Although little was previously known about the general, he was considered one of the most influential officers of the Revolutionary Guard abroad.
Iran, alongside Russia, is the most important ally of Syrian ruler Bashar al-Assad. Tehran considers Syria to be part of the so-called "axis of resistance" in its fight against Israel, alongside Lebanese militant group Hezbollah.
According to Tehran, however, Iranian military personnel are not directly involved in the Syrian civil war and act only as advisers.

author: TV9 Bharatvarsh
title: श्वेता तिवारी छोड़िए, 'मिस्टर बजाज' ने भी रियल लाइफ में की दो-दो शादियां, 28 साल पहले दिलीप कुमार की भांजी से हुआ तलाक
text: 44 साल की श्वेता तिवारी को जिस शो ने पहचान दिलाई, वो है- 'कसौटी जिंदगी की'. एक वक्त पर यह स्टार प्लस का टॉप शो हुआ करता था. जहां प्रेरणा-अनुराग बसु की लव स्टोरी ने सबको हंसाया और रुलाया. वहीं मिस्टर बजाज की पत्नी बन प्रेरणा की जिंदगी में आए ट्विस्ट एंड टर्न्स भी सबको पसंद आए. पर आज भी मिस्टर बजाज और प्रेरणा चर्चा में रहते हैं. लगातार काम तो कर ही रहे हैं, पर लव लाइफ भी सुर्खियों में रही हैं.. आपकी फेवरेट प्रेरणा ने टीवी में कई बार शादियां की हैं. पर शादी के मामले में वो रियल लाइफ में बिल्कुल भी लकी नहीं रहीं. पहली शादी राजा से हुई, जिसपर मारपीट के आरोप लगाए और अलग हो गईं. फिर प्यार और शादी की और दोबारा वही झेलना पड़ा. पर क्या आप जानते हैं मिस्टर बजाज की कहानी भी दो-दो शादियों वाली है. उनकी पहली पत्नी का दिलीप कुमार से खास कनेक्शन रहा है.. 59 साल के मिस्टर बजाज यानी रोनित रॉय की पहली शादी साल 1990 में हुई थी. उनकी पहली पत्नी का नाम है- जोआना मुमताज खान. उनकी पहली शादी से एक बेटी भी हैं, जिसका नाम है-ओना. जो अपनी मां के साथ अमेरिका में रहती हैं. साथ ही दिखने में काफी ग्लैमरस हैं. दरअसल एक्टर खुद एक्सेप्ट कर चुके हैं कि वो पहले बच्चे के लिए अच्छे पिता नहीं बन सके.. रोनित रॉय जब अपनी पहली पत्नी जोआना मुमताज खान से अलग हुए. उस वक्त उनकी बेटी महज 6 महीने की थी. हालांकि, बढ़ती दूरियां और पर्सनल लाइफ में आने वाली दिक्कतों के चलते उन्होंने 1997 में तलाक ले लिया था.. बहुत कम लोग जानते हैं कि रोनित रॉय की पहली पत्नी जोआना मुमताज खान कोई और नहीं, बल्कि दिलीप कुमार की भांजी हैं. हालांकि, पहली पत्नी से अलग होने के बाद साल 2003 में उन्होंने दूसरी शादी कर ली थी. वो एक्ट्रेस नीलम के प्यार में थे, जिनके साथ अब खुशहाल जिंदगी बिता रहे हैं.. दरअसल रोनित रॉय के कुल तीन बच्चे हैं. पहली शादी से एक बेटी ओना. और दूसरी शादी से बेटी आडोर और बेटा अगस्त्य. हालांकि, वो अपनी पहली बेटी को इंस्टाग्राम पर फॉलो करते हैं. साथ ही वो भी पिता से कनेक्टेड हैं. रोनित रॉय की रियल लाइफ भी काफी चर्चा में रही है.. रोनित रॉय की दूसरी पत्नी नीलम भी उनकी तरह की चर्चा में रहती हैं. दरअसल वो काफी ग्लैमरस और फिट हैं. सोशल मीडिया के जरिए लोग उनकी श्वेता तिवारी से तुलना करते हैं. दरअसल नीलम रॉय का स्टाइलिंग सेंस भी काफी जबरदस्त है. कुछ वक्त पहले ही रोनित और नीलम ने अपनी एनिवर्सरी पर दोबारा सात फेरे लिए थे. .

author: U.Today
title: Celsius Network Wins Court Permission for Bitcoin Mining By U.Today
text:
© Reuters. Celsius Network Wins Court Permission for Bitcoin Mining BTC/USD -0.67% Add to/Remove from a Portfolio Add to Watchlist Add Position Position added successfully to:
Please name your holdings portfolio Type: BUY SELL Date: Amount: Price Point Value: Leverage: 1:1 1:10 1:25 1:50 1:100 1:200 1:400 1:500 1:1000 Commission: Create New Watchlist Create Create a new holdings portfolio Add Create + Add another position Close U.Today - According to , a bankruptcy judge has allowed cryptocurrency lender Celsius Network's switch to Bitcoin mining, stating that the company could diverge from a previously approved bankruptcy plan since creditors and clients would not be harmed by the new restructuring.
The change means that will cut ties with some of the outside bidders who were chosen to oversee the new company, leaving mining company US Bitcoin Corp. in charge of the new, creditor-owned mining business.
Celsius made the known in a new tweet, stating that the court has approved the implementation of its "MiningCo transaction," thus proceeding with its plan.
"MiningCo Transaction" envisions the development of a new publicly traded Bitcoin mining company, which will result in increased liquid cryptocurrency dividends to account holders following Celsius's expected bankruptcy exit in early 2024.
Celsius claims that its customers will own equity in Mining NewCo, which will be managed by US Data Mining Group, Inc. It goes on to say that this is another key milestone in its Chapter 11 cases, as it maps a new course for the company.
After the SEC denied that plan, Celsius its broader intentions to generate fees from validating cryptocurrency transactions and launching new lines of business.
Celsius's scaled-back bankruptcy plan frees up $225 million in cryptocurrency assets that would have been used to support the SEC-rejected new lines.
Celsius filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection in July 2022 and is expected to exit this state in early 2024.
This article was originally published on U.Today
Celsius Network Wins Court Permission for Bitcoin Mining

author: @hardwarecombr
title: 70% dos usuários dizem "por favor" e "obrigado" ao ChatGPT - e o medo é um dos motivos - Hardware.com.br
text:
Uma pesquisa recente revelou que 70% dos usuários interagem de forma educada com ferramentas de IA como o ChatGPT, mas os motivos para isso vão além da simples cortesia. Para muitos, ser educado é um reflexo natural, mas há quem tema possíveis consequências no futuro – incluindo uma hipotética rebelião da inteligência artificial.
O estudo, conduzido pela editora da TechRadar, Future, entrevistou mais de 1.000 pessoas nos EUA e no Reino Unido, trazendo insights curiosos sobre como tratamos assistentes de IA. A maioria dos usuários (82% nos EUA e 83% no Reino Unido) considera normal dizer “por favor” e “obrigado” ao interagir com a IA, independentemente de estar falando com uma máquina ou um humano.
No entanto, uma parcela significativa (18% nos EUA e 17% no Reino Unido) acredita que ser educado com a IA pode evitar problemas no futuro, caso a tecnologia se torne mais avançada e desenvolva algum tipo de autonomia. O medo de uma revolta das máquinas, reforçado por décadas de ficção científica, ainda influencia o comportamento de parte dos usuários.
Ser educado melhora a IA?
Outro grupo de usuários acredita que interagir com a IA de maneira educada pode resultar em respostas mais precisas e úteis. Segundo um estudo publicado pela Forbes, comandos formulados de maneira polida tendem a ser interpretados de forma mais eficiente pelos modelos de IA, levando a uma performance até 30% melhor em algumas tarefas.
Por outro lado, cerca de 30% dos entrevistados afirmam que não veem sentido em serem educados com a IA, pois ela não possui emoções. Além disso, alguns preferem interações diretas e objetivas para economizar tempo.
O que a própria IA diz sobre isso?
Quando questionado sobre o tema, o próprio ChatGPT respondeu:
“Como uma IA, não preciso de polidez porque não tenho sentimentos ou emoções. Mas acho interessante que as pessoas geralmente são educadas, mesmo quando estão falando com uma máquina. Isso torna a interação mais agradável para a maioria das pessoas e pode realmente levar a melhores resultados em alguns casos, já que pedidos educados geralmente são formulados de forma mais precisa.”
E você? Usa ferramentas como o ChatGPT? Qual a maneira que interage com a IA?
